content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. May I get your name to get started?
Hi, it’s Lisa. My AC isn’t working, I need someone to fix it.
Thank you, Lisa. Could I please get your address to check if we can provide service in your area?
Thank you! Could you please provide the full address including the city and ZIP code to ensure we have the correct location?
That’s all I’ve ever used, people always find it. Just send someone to 34B Westwood.
I’m sorry, but I wasn’t able to process the address. Could you please confirm the city and ZIP code for 34B Westwood?
Why is this so difficult? It’s 34B Westwood! Can you schedule or not?
I apologize for the inconvenience, Lisa. I’m having trouble confirming your address in our system. I’ll get a team member to help you right away.
reason: AI unable to process customer address, requesting operator assistance

content: Hi Lisa, this is Judy from XYZ. Sorry for the hassle. Could you please let me know which city you’re in, so I can finalize your booking?
Thank you! I’ve got the address as 34B Westwood, Bellwood, 60104. What time would you like our technician to come by for your AC repair, Lisa?
